author: vargasa
body:
#### PR description:

@ianna, @ghugo83, @cvuosalo 

Producing logs:
```
cmsRun ddd_ZMM_Run3_Step1_cfg.py >dd.log
cmsRun dd4hep_ZMM_Run3_Step1_cfg.py > dd4hep.log
```

#### Validation

##### master dd4hep.log
```
$ grep Building dd4hep.log

END
```

This is progress, but again we find a problem when reaching `PixelForwardZplus`:
```
CmsTrackerLayerBuilder::buildComponent TkDDDStructure
        /OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelForwardZplus_1
GeometricDet::GeometricDet      /OCMS_1/CMSE_1/Tracker_1/PixelForwardZplus_1
%MSG-e CmsTrackerLayerBuilder:  OscarMTProducer:g4SimHits@streamBeginRun  17-Sep-2020 08:45:13 CDT Run: 1 Stream: 0
 ERROR - I was expecting a String, Rod or Ladder, I got a PixelPhase1EndcapSubDet

```
This last error means that the fv is not what is expected, so either an additional `break` or an additional `firstChild()` call is needed.

@ianna I couldn't cherry pick the `fv::level` from your PR, but we definitely need it as `fv.geoHistory()` is called multiple times and its performance is slower
title: DD4hep: TrackerNumberingBuilder: Progress on Tracker Geometry Navigation
